Nightlight/?????:

Nightlight appeared and said "What's going on?"

The bot sudeness moved trying to freed himself and he just only got 
that the cables tight more. He felt weak and just could do low 
screams of pain.

Nighlight looked the bot and said "I guess that he's scared and if we 
don't free him he will die..."

She knee down close of the bot and tried to loosen the cables she 
just could loosen the cables abit; Nightlight looked to Aerotaur and 
said "Do you have a knife or some thing to cut the cables?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      He looked over his shoulder at the scream.  He started running 
toward the sound.  As he approached the Survivor he slowed down and 
put his hands up.  "I'm here to help you."
